name: Martial Artist
flower_description: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.
feather_description: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.
sand_description: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.
goblet_description: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.
circlet_description: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.
four_pc_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.
